activities: Personal data received in the US from the EU and Switzerland that is covered by RR Donnelley’s safe harbor self-certification includes: (1) personal data that RR Donnelley receives from EU and Swiss corporate customers for processing in accordance with the relevant customer’s instructions and on such customer’s behalf; with respect to this personal data, RR Donnelley acts as a mere data processor for purposes of conducting mailings and performing other services for the customer; (2) personal data that RR Donnelley receives from its EU and Swiss corporate customers as a data controller for purposes of managing customer relationships, managing orders, tracking payments and ensuring payment, and otherwise maintaining the customer relationship; and (3) human resources personal data that RR Donnelley receives in the United States from the European Union and Switzerland as a data controller for purposes of maintaining an internal telephone/email directory, managing global business operations, compensation decisions/bonus calculations, employee performance reviews, talent management and succession planning.  The human resources personal data received is stored on an intranet/database that can be accessed by other companies in the wider RR Donnelley group who may be based outside the United States.
